body:
This new package contains instructions on building [Elmer FEM solver](https://www.csc.fi/web/elmer).

It builds Elmer, ElmerICE and contributed solvers with MPI support.

Variants include:
- `+hypre` - For Hypre support (default: off).
- `+lua` - For Lua support  (default: off).
- `+mumps` - For MUMPS support  (default: off).
- `+openmp` - For OpenMP support  (default: on).
- `+trilinos` - For Trilinos support  (default: off).
- `+zoltan` - For Zoltan support  (default: off).
title: elmer-fem: New package for Elmer finite element method solver.
